alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Medina; Richland; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:56AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Richland, southwestern Medina, Ashland, western Wayne and northwestern Holmes Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1155 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New London to near Bellville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Lodi, Loudonville, Bellville, Shreve, West Salem, Hayesville, Savannah, Polk, Nashville, Sullivan, Westfield Center, Butler, Perrysville, Lucas, Jeromesville, Bailey Lakes, Burbank and Congress. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for north central Ohio. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio.
